Package com.rs.seagull.emulator.api

Class Colors.AnsiPlus

java.lang.Object
com.rs.seagull.emulator.api.Colors.AnsiPlus
Enclosing class:
Colors
public static class Colors.AnsiPlus extends Object
These are colors for an AnsiPlus host that are returned by Attributed.getForegroundColor() and Attributed.getBackgroundColor().
Version:
$Id$
Author:
MRomijn
